org.tigris.noodle
Class NoodleTest

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.GenericServlet
        |
        +--javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
              |
              +--org.tigris.noodle.NoodleTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class NoodleTest
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

A basic poorly written servlet for testing the functionality of Noodle.

Here is an example URL for using it (with Tomcat):

http://www.foo.com/noodle/servlet/Noodle?page=%2Fnoodle%2Fservlet%2FNoodleTest

That will return a form that you can submit. The doGet() method sends a Set-Cookie: header that the POST method will display the contents of the cookie. This proves that both passing form data as well as Cookie headers through Noodle works.

Author:
Jon S. Stevens
See Also:
Serialized Form
